title: I get 500 ping
body: I am getting 500 ping in game and am disconnecting please help  riot.

replies.body: I have enjoyed playing League for many years now with a consistent ping of 70. Since patch 6.9 myself and many other users are experiencing frequent lag spikes in game of up to 200-500. Even my use on this website is affected by lag issues but I am not having difficulty on any other web or game service. The game isn't playable right now for me. I have confidence that Riot will fix it, but many people are posting about it in threads right now and I haven't seen any notice put out that they are aware its a serious issue affecting this many people. I would really like to.
This happens to me to. Character randomly stops, ping jumps to exactly 500, and the d/c.

We should be able to help out and get this resolved!  But first, I need some extra information:  Does your ping spike up to 500?  Or is your ping always and consistently at 500?  Depending on which it is, it does point to very different root causes.

Reply back and let me know!

Its spiking up to 500 in game it stopped lately but now whenever I enter draft pick it gives me an error message

Hmmm, given that it gives you an error message as well as spiking up randomly, it seems like the root cause of this issue is some sort of weird connection issue.  Make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are quite a number of steps there, but they are all crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.
